oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Geological Map of the State of Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Maps; Mineral deposits; Geology; Minerals; Rivers; Cities & towns
Agriculture; Geology; Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This map of the state of Tennessee shows main rivers and tributaries, towns and cities, and some geologic data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Troost, Gerard, 1776-1850
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This map accompanied the 5th geological report to the Tennessee General Assembly by Gerard Troost. Troost served as Tennessee State Geologist from 1831 to 1850. In total, he authored 43 geological reports.
